name: Big Baby Cop
description:
You are playing as a cop, in a fast and dynamic runner game! Catch the crime-man and try to run as much time as you can! Random locations and good music make this game a cool time-killer!:)

You are playing as a cop, in a fast and dynamic runner game! Catch the crime-man and try to run as much time as you can! Random locations and good music make this game a cool time-killer!:)

This game is in early development and we will update it: a new characters, a new locations and more in future updates! :0
